channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: Score Jacobian Chaining: Lifting Pretrained 2D Diffusion Models for 3D Generation
item.description: We propose to apply chain rule on the learned gradients, and back-propagate the score of a diffusion model through the Jacobian of a differentiable renderer, which we instantiate to be a voxel radiance field.

item.title: ExtremeBERT: A Toolkit for Accelerating Pretraining of Customized BERT
item.description: In this paper, we present ExtremeBERT, a toolkit for accelerating and customizing BERT pretraining.

item.title: Zero-Shot Image Restoration Using Denoising Diffusion Null-Space Model
item.description: Most existing Image Restoration (IR) models are task-specific, which can not be generalized to different degradation operators.

item.title: TorchScale: Transformers at Scale
item.description: Large Transformers have achieved state-of-the-art performance across many tasks.

item.title: Compressing Volumetric Radiance Fields to 1 MB
item.description: Approximating radiance fields with volumetric grids is one of promising directions for improving NeRF, represented by methods like Plenoxels and DVGO, which achieve super-fast training convergence and real-time rendering.

item.title: Mixed Neural Voxels for Fast Multi-view Video Synthesis
item.description: In this paper, we present a novel method named MixVoxels to better represent the dynamic scenes with fast training speed and competitive rendering qualities.

item.title: DiffusionBERT: Improving Generative Masked Language Models with Diffusion Models
item.description: We present DiffusionBERT, a new generative masked language model based on discrete diffusion models.

item.title: Multiresolution Textual Inversion
item.description: We extend Textual Inversion to learn pseudo-words that represent a concept at different resolutions.

item.title: DAMO-YOLO : A Report on Real-Time Object Detection Design
item.description: In this report, we present a fast and accurate object detection method dubbed DAMO-YOLO, which achieves higher performance than the state-of-the-art YOLO series.

item.title: SuperFusion: Multilevel LiDAR-Camera Fusion for Long-Range HD Map Generation and Prediction
item.description: To this end, we propose a novel network named SuperFusion, exploiting the fusion of LiDAR and camera data at multiple levels.

item.title: Versatile Diffusion: Text, Images and Variations All in One Diffusion Model
item.description: Through our experiments, we demonstrate that VD and its underlying framework have the following merits: a) VD handles all subtasks with competitive quality; b) VD initiates novel extensions and applications such as disentanglement of style and semantic, image-text dual-guided generation, etc.

item.title: MeMViT: Memory-Augmented Multiscale Vision Transformer for Efficient Long-Term Video Recognition
item.description: Instead of trying to process more frames at once like most existing methods, we propose to process videos in an online fashion and cache "memory" at each iteration.

item.title: Roboflow 100: A Rich, Multi-Domain Object Detection Benchmark
item.description: The evaluation of object detection models is usually performed by optimizing a single metric, e. g. mAP, on a fixed set of datasets, e. g. Microsoft COCO and Pascal VOC.

item.title: Shape, Pose, and Appearance from a Single Image via Bootstrapped Radiance Field Inversion
item.description: Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) coupled with GANs represent a promising direction in the area of 3D reconstruction from a single view, owing to their ability to efficiently model arbitrary topologies.

item.title: Human-level play in the game of Diplomacy by combining language models with strategic reasoning
item.description: Despite much progress in training AI systems to imitate human language, building agents that use language to communicate intentionally with humans in interactive environments remains a major challenge.

item.title: OpenFE: Automated Feature Generation beyond Expert-level Performance
item.description: The major challenge in automated feature generation is to efficiently and accurately identify useful features from a vast pool of candidate features.

item.title: H3WB: Human3.6M 3D WholeBody Dataset and Benchmark
item.description: We also report several baselines from popular methods for these tasks.

item.title: ZeroEGGS: Zero-shot Example-based Gesture Generation from Speech
item.description: In a series of experiments, we first demonstrate the flexibility and generalizability of our model to new speakers and styles.

item.title: Medical Image Segmentation Review: The success of U-Net
item.description: U-Net is the most widespread image segmentation architecture due to its flexibility, optimized modular design, and success in all medical image modalities.

item.title: DiffusionDet: Diffusion Model for Object Detection
item.description: In inference, the model refines a set of randomly generated boxes to the output results in a progressive way.
